re.alwyn974.openlauncherlib.util.explorer

Class Explorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • re.alwyn974.openlauncherlib.util.explorer.ExploredDirectory
      • re.alwyn974.openlauncherlib.util.explorer.Explorer

  • public class Explorer
extends ExploredDirectory
    The Explorer

    Use the explorer to explore some directories.

    Code example : 
         Explorer explorer = new Explorer(new File("mydir"));
     explorer.cd("mysub");
     List files = explorer.files(); // Return the list of files in the mysub directory
    The Explorer is extending ExploredDirectory, so you can use .files() or .subs() etc...
    Since:
    3.0.0-BETA
    Version:
    3.0.2-BETA
    Author:
    Litarvan
    See Also:
